data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December, 2022
data.news_body:
This is with reference to subject filings made on 14.02.2023 with stock exchange(s).

The said filings inter-alia contained stand-alone and consolidated financial results for Q3 & 9MFY'23 along with
Auditor's reports thereon. All these documents/ reports were signed on 14.02.2023 and dated accordingly except Auditor's Review report on Consolidated Financial Results which inadvertently mentioned 14.02.2022. The said date of 14.02.2022 be read as 14.02.2023 at the last page of attached Auditor's report. A letter of joint Auditors in this regard is attached.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: This is further to our communications on the subject dated 13.02.2023 and 15.02.2023, in terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, it is informed that transcript of the subject conference call on Q3 FY'' 23 Financial Results has been uploaded at the website of the Company and may be accessed at:- https://ongcindia.com/web/eng/transcription

data.news_body: This in reference to our earlier communication vide letter dated 13.02.2023 w.r.t. conference call on Q3 FY 2022-23 Financial Results, held today i.e. Wednesday, 15th February, 2023.In terms of Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, it is informed that audio recordings of subject conference call has been uploaded at the website of the Company and may be accessed at:https://ongcindia.com/web/eng/audio/video-recordings

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting & Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For H1  FY'23
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e 14.11.2022 has approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and Half Year ended 30th September, 2022 and has declared interim dividend of  Rs. 6.75 per equity share of face value of Rs. 5/- each i.e.at the rate of 135. % for the Financial Year 2022-23.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June 2022
data.news_body:
This is in continuation to our letter dated 03.08.2022, it is hereby informed that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. 12.08.2022 has, inter-alia, considered and approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022.
Please find enclosed herewith a copy of the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2022 along with limited review report of the Auditors thereon.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2021
data.news_body:
It is hereby informed that the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today i.e 11.02.2022 has inter -alia considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and Nine months ended 31st December 2021.


The Board of Directors have declared 2nd Interim Dividend of Rs.1.75 per equity share of face value of Rs.5/- each i.e.
35%, for the Financial year 2021-2022.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body:
Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today i.e 12.11.2021 has inter-alia considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2021. Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with limited review report of the Auditors thereon and Related Party Transactions are enclosed.

The Board of Directors has declared an Interim Dividend of Rs..5.50 per equity share, of the face value of Rs,5/- each
i.e.110 percent, for the Financial Year 2021-2022

data.news_body:

Please find enclosed herewith a copy of the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company along with limited review
report of the Auditors.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Result For The Quarter Ended 31.12.2020
data.news_body: Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today i.e. 13.02.2021 has inter-alia considered and approved Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter  ended 31st December 2020.

data.caption:
Outcome Of Board Meeting
(A) Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2020
(B) Declaration Of Interim Dividend For The FY 2020-21
data.news_body:
We hereby inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today i.e. 13.02.2021 has inter-alia considered and approved the following:-
i)Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with limited review report as issued by the Statutory Auditors for the Quarter ended 31st December 2020
ii) Board has declared an Interim dividend of Rs.1.75/- per equity share for the financial year 2020-21
